trans-unit.source: Defines size-related attributes of a cached bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 캐시된 비트맵 이미지의 크기 관련 특성을 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: A bitmap is scaled based on values that are defined by this class.
trans-unit.target: 비트맵의 크기가 이 클래스에 정의된 값에 따라 조정됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> with empty sizing properties.
trans-unit.target: 크기 조정 속성이 비어 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> 갖습니다 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> 속성이로 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> 로 설정 `true`, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> 을 0으로 설정 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> 0으로 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When passed to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, the input is the same as the output.
trans-unit.target: 에 전달 될 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, 입력이 출력와 동일 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.

Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight" />.
trans-unit.target: 원본 비트맵의 가로 세로 비율을 유지하고 초기 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight" />를 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />의 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> 갖습니다 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> 속성이로 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> 로 설정 `true`, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> 의 값으로 설정 `pixelHeight`, 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> 0으로 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> is less than zero.
The initial rotation value to apply.
Only 90 degree increments are supported.

Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation" /> to apply.
trans-unit.target: 원본 비트맵의 가로 세로 비율을 유지하고 초기 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />를 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation" />의 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
The resulting bitmap maintains its original aspect ratio and sizing.
trans-unit.target: 결과 비트맵 이미지에는 원래 가로 세로 비율과 크기 조정 유지 관리합니다.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to the value of `rotation`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to 0, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> 갖습니다 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> 속성의 값으로 설정 `rotation`, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> 로 설정 `true`, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> 0으로 설정 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> 0으로 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.

Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth" />.
trans-unit.target: 원본 비트맵의 가로 세로 비율을 유지하고 초기 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth" />를 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />의 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> 갖습니다 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> 속성이로 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> 로 설정 `true`, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> 을 0으로 설정 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> 의 값으로 설정 `pixelWidth`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="pixelWidth" /> is less than zero.
The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that does not preserve the original bitmap aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: 원래 비트맵의 가로 세로 비율을 유지하지 않는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />의 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
The resulting bitmap has an effective size of `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: 결과 비트맵 이미지에 대 한 유효 크기 `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `false`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> 갖습니다 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> 속성이로 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> 로 설정 `false`, 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> 의 값으로 설정 `pixelHeight`, 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> 의 값으로 설정 `pixelWidth`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> is less than zero.
The height, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
The height of the bitmap.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> must be greater than zero to be valid.
The width, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
The width of the bitmap.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> must be greater than zero to be valid.
Gets a value that determines whether the aspect ratio of the original bitmap image is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 원래 비트맵 이미지의 가로 세로 비율이 유지되는지 여부를 결정하는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the original aspect ratio is maintained; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 원본 가로 세로 비율이 유지되면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the original aspect ratio is preserved, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> represent the maximum size values for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 경우 원래 가로 세로 비율 유지 되 면 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> 비트맵에 대 한 최대 크기 값을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap is only guaranteed to have either its width or its height match the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 결과 비트맵의 너비 또는 높이가 지정 된 값과 일치 하도록 보장 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the aspect ratio is not preserved, the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> are both used, and the bitmap is stretched to use those values.
trans-unit.target: 가로 세로 비율은 유지 되지 않고, 지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> 을 모두 사용 하 고 해당 값을 사용 하도록 비트맵 확대 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the rotation angle that is applied to a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 비트맵에 적용되는 회전 각도 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The rotation angle that is applied to the image.
Only increments of 90 degrees are supported.
